name: Keyboard Konundrum 🎹
description:
Controls: Use the ARROW KEYS to move the ragdoll player. To use the keyboard player, literally press any key on your keyboard. If some of the keys work incorrectly you might have to change your keyboard layout to English (USA).

Description: One player controls the keyboard, the other controls the ragdoll. The ragdoll player wants to reach the goal and the keyboard player's goal is to prevent the ragdoll player from reaching the goal.
